content.prompt:
Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa / Art Resource, NY

The visual characteristics of the work shown are best described as which of the following?

choices.label: Precise woven patterns that form a heavily textured surface
Large-scale abstract shapes that are best appreciated from a distance
Spiral-based patterns created by cutting designs into canvas
Painted geometric and nature-based motifs arranged in complex patterns

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
